summary: Yes, that\'s right, it\'s Chuck Norris. You don\'t play as him, he allows you to pretend to be him and all his Epicness. (saved game & char created with vanilla creation system)
descriptionHtml:
For once in your life you may play as Chuck Norris, the famous TV badass who can roundhouse kick his way to victory. This character was made with the original (vanilla) character creation system, so that EVERYBODY may play as him
***NO MODS REQUIRED***
=========================================================================================
INSTALLATION:
extract the ESS file to your: User/Documents/MyGames/Skyrim/Saves

and you\'re done!
============================================================================================
I hope you all enjoy this char I made, as I am new to making these characters, this is only my 2nd character.
Here is the link to my first character: King Leonidas http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6045

Please feel free to spread this file around, as I made it purely for enjoyment. no credit required if uploaded to a different site!
========================================================================================
Happy Roundhouse Kicking!
-MorninJerky
author: MorninJerky
